name: spatiotemporal-asset-catalog
description: STAC (SpatioTemporal Asset Catalog) is a standard that provides a common structure for exposing and cataloging geospatial data, such as imagery, SAR, point clouds, data cubes, and more. STAC enables access to different spatial data formats and provides a common way to find information about a geographic location over time. The main components are Item, Catalog, and Collection. The 'catalog.json' typically serves as the entry point for navigating the catalog structure, which can be compared to a directory tree, grouping other catalogs, collections, and items for discovery and browsing.
